house_listing.house_description: Lovely home on great street, fresh paint thru out, has living rm, dining rm & family rm. This home is ready for move in - just place your furnishings & start living. Larchmont, blair & maury schools. Attached garage w/spacious storage loft.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Attic Fan, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), ColonialStyle, Fenced, Pantry, Walk-In Closet(s)
